ru: Одну ногу выведите назад и вверх.
Противположной от согнутой ноги кистью перекрёстно возьмитесь за голень.
en: With the hand opposite the bent leg, cross over and firmly grasp the shin.

ru: Плечо которое ушло назад выведите вперед, чтобы между плечевыми образовалась прямая линия.
en: Bring the shoulder that moved back forward, aligning both shoulders into a straight line.
enSynonyms: Guide the retracted shoulder forward to create an even alignment across both shoulders.
Adjust the backward-shifted shoulder ahead so your shoulders form a straight horizontal line.
Move the shoulder that drifted back into place, ensuring a level line between them.
Reposition the shoulder that lagged behind, establishing a balanced straightness in your shoulders.
Shift the displaced shoulder forward, creating symmetry and alignment across your shoulder girdle.

ru: Таз сместите в сторону поднятой ноги.
en: Shift your hips towards the side of your lifted leg.
enSynonyms: Move your pelvis in the direction of your raised leg.
